Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.personalBoard.resourceManager

Class ResourceManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.observer.GameMasterObservable
it.polimi.ingsw.model.personalBoard.resourceManager.ResourceManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observable<ResourceManagerObserver>
public class ResourceManager
extends GameMasterObservable
implements Observable<ResourceManagerObserver>
ResourceManager is the class that manage all the action where a resource is used

    • convertAnyRequirement

      public void convertAnyRequirement​(java.util.ArrayList<Resource> resources, boolean isFromBuyDevelopment) throws AnyConversionNotPossible
      Convert any into resources from card requirement
      Parameters:
      resources - I want to own after conversion
      isFromBuyDevelopment - true if the any request started from a buy development action
      Throws:
      AnyConversionNotPossible - if the conversion is not legal

    • subToStrongbox

      public void subToStrongbox​(Resource resource) throws NegativeResourceException, InvalidStateActionException
      Subtract to the strongbox the resource
      Parameters:
      resource - i want to subtract
      Throws:
      NegativeResourceException - if u try to subtract more than you own
      InvalidStateActionException - if u can't do it right now

    • addToWarehouse

      public void addToWarehouse​(boolean isNormalDepot, int index, Resource resource) throws TooMuchResourceDepotException, InvalidOrganizationWarehouseException
      Add to the warehouse the resource
      Parameters:
      isNormalDepot - true for default false for leaderDepots
      index - of the depot i want to access (0 -> 1 res), (1 -> 2 res), (2 -> 3 res)
      resource - i want to add to that specific depot
      Throws:
      TooMuchResourceDepotException - if i'm trying to add too much resource to that depot
      InvalidOrganizationWarehouseException - if i'm trying to add a resource to one depot when there's another one with the same type

    • subToWarehouse

      public void subToWarehouse​(boolean isNormalDepot, int index, Resource resource) throws InvalidOrganizationWarehouseException, NegativeResourceException
      Subtract to the warehouse the resource
      Parameters:
      isNormalDepot - true for default false for leaderDepots
      index - of the depot i want to access
      resource - i want to subtract to that specific depot
      Throws:
      InvalidOrganizationWarehouseException - if i'm trying to add a resource to one depot when there's other one with the same type
      NegativeResourceException - if the value of the resource in depot goes under 0

    • switchResourceFromDepotToDepot

      public void switchResourceFromDepotToDepot​(int fromIndex, boolean isFromNormalDepot, int toIndex, boolean isToNormalDepot) throws TooMuchResourceDepotException, InvalidOrganizationWarehouseException, InvalidStateActionException
      Switch the resource from fromDepot to toDepot
      Parameters:
      fromIndex - from where i want to move
      isFromNormalDepot - true if normal, false if leader
      toIndex - where i want to put the resources
      isToNormalDepot - true if normal, false if leader
      Throws:
      TooMuchResourceDepotException - if there is too many resources in one depot at the end
      InvalidStateActionException - if u can't do the switch, as turn phase
      InvalidOrganizationWarehouseException - if u can't do the switch u are asking for

      Throws:
